content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/meetup is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java 8 codebase to Java 17. The repository is located at `/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/meetup`. 

I should:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Look at the pom.xml or build configuration to see current Java version
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if there are any issues
5. Fix any issues that arise
6. Continue until `mvn clean verify` passes

Let me start by viewing the repository structure.

Let me check the main pom.xml file to understand the current Java version configuration:

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
    <artifactId>meetup</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <modules>
        <module>meetup-query</module>
        <module>meetup-command</module>
        <module>meetup-api</module>
    </modules>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <name>meetup</name>
    <description>Meetup demo application</description>

    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>2.1.3.RELEASE</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
        <java.version>1.8</java.version>
        <axon.version>4.1</axon.version>
        <spring.data.version>2.1.3.RELEASE</spring.data.version>
        <spring.webflux.version>2.1.3.RELEASE</spring.webflux.version>
        <h2.version>1.4.198</h2.version>
        <kotlin.version>1.3.21</kotlin.version>
        <jib.version>1.0.0</jib.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <!-- Meetup Dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
                <artifactId>meetup-api</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
                <artifactId>meetup-command</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
                <artifactId>meetup-query</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <!-- Axon Dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.axonframework</groupId>
                <artifactId>axon-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
                <version>${axon.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.axonframework</groupId>
                <artifactId>axon-modelling</artifactId>
                <version>${axon.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.axonframework</groupId>
                <artifactId>axon-test</artifactId>
                <version>${axon.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <!-- Spring Dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
                <version>${spring.data.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webflux</artifactId>
                <version>${spring.webflux.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <!-- Kotlin Dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.jetbrains.kotlin</groupId>
                <artifactId>kotlin-stdlib-jdk8</artifactId>
                <version>${kotlin.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <!-- H2 Dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
                <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
                <version>${h2.version}</version>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                    <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.jetbrains.kotlin</groupId>
                    <artifactId>kotlin-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${kotlin.version}</version>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>com.google.cloud.tools</groupId>
                    <artifactId>jib-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${jib.version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <skip>true</skip>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
    </build>

</project>

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <parent>
        <artifactId>meetup</artifactId>
        <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
        <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </parent>
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <packaging>jar</packaging>

    <artifactId>meetup-command</artifactId>
    <description>Command side of Meetup demo application</description>

    <dependencies>
        <!-- Meetup Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.axoniq.demo</groupId>
            <artifactId>meetup-api</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <!-- Axon Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.axonframework</groupId>
            <artifactId>axon-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.axonframework</groupId>
            <artifactId>axon-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <!-- Spring Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <!-- JUnit Dependencies -->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>com.google.cloud.tools</groupId>
                <artifactId>jib-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <skip>false</skip>
                    <to>
                        <image>meetup-command</image>
                    </to>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>

Content: package io.axoniq.demo.meetup.api

import org.axonframework.modelling.command.TargetAggregateIdentifier

data class CreateMeetupCommand(@TargetAggregateIdentifier val meetupId: String, val topic: String, val user: String)
data class CommentOnTopicCommand(@TargetAggregateIdentifier val meetupId: String, val comment: String, val user: String)
data class CloseMeetupCommand(@TargetAggregateIdentifier val meetupId: String, val user: String)

data class MeetupCreatedEvent(val meetupId: String, val topic: String, val user: String)
data class TopicCommentedEvent(val meetupId: String, val comment: String, val user: String)
data class MeetupClosedEvent(val meetupId: String, val user: String)

data class MeetupCommentsQuery(val meetupId: String) {
    fun matches(meetupId: String): Boolean {
        return this.meetupId == meetupId
    }
}

## Migration Summary

The Java 8 codebase has been successfully migrated to Java 17. The following changes were made:

### 1. **Main POM file** (`/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/meetup/pom.xml`):
   - Updated Spring Boot parent version from `2.1.3.RELEASE` to `2.7.18` (compatible with Java 17)
   - Changed `java.version` from `1.8` to `17`
   - Added explicit `maven.compiler.source` and `maven.compiler.target` set to `17`
   - Updated dependency versions:
     - Axon Framework: `4.1` → `4.6.3`
     - Spring Data: `2.1.3.RELEASE` → `2.7.18`
     - Spring WebFlux: `2.1.3.RELEASE` → `2.7.18`
     - H2 Database: `1.4.198` → `2.1.214`
     - Kotlin: `1.3.21` → `1.7.22`
     - Jib Maven Plugin: `1.0.0` → `3.3.1`

### 2. **Meetup-API POM** (`/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/meetup/meetup-api/pom.xml`):
   - Updated Kotlin JVM target from `1.8` to `17`

### 3. **Build Verification**:
   - `mvn clean verify` completes successfully with **BUILD SUCCESS**
   - All modules compile correctly: meetup-api, meetup-query, and meetup-command
   - Bytecode verification confirms classes are compiled to Java 17 (major version 61)
   - Both Java and Kotlin sources compile to Java 17 target

The migration is complete and the project now runs on Java 17 with all updated dependencies compatible with the new Java version.
